snippet: The N.H.L.'s latest controversy arises over a mysteriously frozen game clock that allowed the Kings to score a game-winning goal against Columbus at Staples Center that should not have counted.
abstract: The N.H.L.'s latest controversy arises over a mysteriously frozen game clock that allowed the Kings to score a game-winning goal against Columbus at Staples Center that should not have counted.

headline.main: Time Stops, Kings Score, N.H.L. Despairs
